data.title: Comfortable
data.text:
Being stuck for 12 days I spent 11 in this hotel. Full size refrigerator 2 burner cook top and microwave. Thru my own fault I didn't notice small magnet on refrigerator telling me front desk has plates etc for use. So I used and reused a cup o soup bowl for my cereal. 
My only complaint would be slamming doors of guest near me and the fact they undoubtedly rented to Sasquatch above me Monday night. Walking so hard it literally shook my bed.

data.title: Great hotel
data.text: The rooms are decent and the staff is really awesome! My only complaint is that the wifi is slower than dog shyt but it's free so it's no biggie. Since I need 200 hundred characters here's a fun fact: camels don't actually store water in those humps it's access to another dimension.

data.title: Avoid!
data.text:
I don't think I've ever written a negative hotel review, but I guess there's always a first time.
This place looks WAY nicer on the outside than in the rooms; the bathroom was especially shabby, with a thick plastic shower curtain that was difficult to wrestle with and let no light through to the shower area.  Extremely limited counter space in the bathroom.
In a room with two queen beds, we were permitted two bath towels and two facecloths. 
Odors carried very quickly from other rooms, down the hall, into our room.
Smokers congregated at the exit, so we were always walking through smoke when leaving & returning.
They required scans & photocopies of IDs for ALL guests; we have never encountered this in all our travels, including other locations in this chain.
Note that no housekeeping is included, and you must leave zero trash in your room or you'll pay a fee.
"Corporate policy" sets the hall temperature at 67 degrees, perhaps to discourage loitering? VERY unpleasant.
This place is supposedly aimed at long-term stays, but I wouldn't recommend a stay of any length, certainly not a long one.  We will never return to this chain.
This place is supposedly aim

owner_response.author: Heather L, Guest Relations Manager at WoodSpring Suites Denver Aurora, responded to this review
owner_response.text: I am very sorry we couldn't accommodate your needs. Thank you for taking the time to leave us a review, we really appreciate it!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Great Atmosphere and Staff!
data.text: Clean rooms, accommodating and friendly management/staff, family friendly, with reasonable prices. Everything we needed and more.. all we had to do was ask. Comfortable month long stay in 4th floor non-smoking room with child. Thanks guys!

owner_response.author: Heather L, Guest Relations Manager at WoodSpring Suites Denver Aurora, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for sharing this feedback with us. We value all comments left by our guests so we can make necessary changes. We want our guests to have a positive experience when staying with us. We are glad overall we could do that for you.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Great place
data.text: One of the best places that I have stayed. The rooms were modern and clean. The staff was friendly and very helpful. I am one hundred percent disabled and in a wheelchair and the staff treated me like I was home.

owner_response.author: Heather L, Guest Relations Manager at WoodSpring Suites Denver Aurora, responded to this review
owner_response.text: We appreciate you taking time to share your comments with us about our staff. We consider them one of our most valuable assets and couldn’t function without them. We will share your comments with them in hopes of continuing to provide a positive experience for our future guests. We hope to see you again soon.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Awesome Hotel
data.text:
The room was clean and modern.
The employees were friendly and professional.
But best of all this is the cheapest hotel in the Denver Area.

I would stay at this hotel again, you really can't beat the bargain.

owner_response.author: Heather L, Guest Relations Manager at WoodSpring Suites Denver Aurora, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you so much for commenting on your recent stay with us.  We are so glad you chose to stay with us. We are also glad you found us conveniently located, found the rooms to be clean and our staff friendly. We do hope you will indeed stay with us again.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: AWESOME
data.text: The staff at thus hotel treat you like family.  The hotel is clean and I feel safe here.  The location meets my needs and is very close to Interstates 225, 25 and 70.  Mike, Daron, Shateria, Walt, Miss Mary and Christina are pleasant and always helpful.  Do not pass this hotel up when visiting Denver!!!!!  GO BRONCOS!!!!!!

owner_response.author: Heather L, Guest Relations Manager at WoodSpring Suites Denver Aurora, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Our team strives to uphold our values of cleanliness, simplicity and affordability in the eyes of our customers. We are glad to hear your stay at Value Place measured up to your standards. Thank you for your kind words and sharing your experience. We hope you will stay with us again in the future.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Very nice and friendly place to stay.
data.text: The room was very clean.  The staff are very polite.  My son was here for work and we were going to look for another place but then decided we could not do better than here and the price was right for us.  I do the cooking and cleaning so when I needed a broom to sweep between their cleanings they are happy to loan one to me.  Micheal one of the staff members was a great help with information that would make our stay more enjoyable!  We had to pay for our wifi but Micheal said that as of next week it will be included since they are changing to Woodsprings.  The room has a refrigerator, microwave, stove and full size bed.

owner_response.author: Heather L, Guest Relations Manager at WoodSpring Suites Denver Aurora, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for your feedback and for staying with us. We realize you have many choices when it comes to lodging, and we sincerely appreciate your business with us. It is nice to see your positive feedback on the cleanliness of the property and our friendly staff.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Met expectation for Price very Spartan
data.text: Stayed in double room 210. Clean and Spartan. Staff was very friendly and helpful. Staff was not at front desk 24 hours, but available via phone to come to desk. Rooms have refrigerator,cook top 2 burner,tv,small table and 2 chairs . WiFy was $10.00 for week. It is an inexpensive place to stay for short term. We stayed 8 nights. We are 76 and 74 with no Children. There are no other facilities available, ie pool gym etc. Planning to stay in Sept

owner_response.author: Heather L, Guest Relations Manager at WoodSpring Suites Denver Aurora, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Our Value Place team is thrilled to hear you enjoyed your time and our team at the property. Our goal is to provide guest with a positive experience when they visit Value Place. Your thoughts about us and your stay are very important to us. We are glad to hear they were both positive experiences. We wish you well and cannot wait to see you again.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Great long-term stay hotel, excellent staff
data.text: This is a clean and well-managed long-term stay hotel. We took our nephew to Colorado for a new job. We made the reservation in advance, and check-in was very smooth. The room was clean and comfortable with all of the advertised amenities. Staff was very professional and courteous. Facilities all well-maintained and nephew said the  hotel was quiet at night. The manager, DaRon Porter was TERRIFIC in assisting us once we were ready to check out.

owner_response.author: Heather L, Guest Relations Manager at WoodSpring Suites Denver Aurora, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you so much for taking time out of your busy schedule to comment on your recent stay at Value Place. It is always nice to hear that we were everything the guest was looking for. We do hope you will stay again next time business or pleasure brings you to the area.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Great Overall Value!
data.text: I stayed at Value Place, the experience was an excellent one. The staff was great, especially Shaiteria and Deron. They went above and beyond to ensure excellent service. Mary kept my room very clean, and the rest of the staff maintained a very clean, very enjoyable environment.

owner_response.author: Heather L, Guest Relations Manager at WoodSpring Suites Denver Aurora, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for choosing to stay with us during your recent visit to Aurora. We are thrilled you encountered our friendly staff, clean facilities and enjoyable environment during your time at Value Place. We hope to welcome you back to Value Place on your next visit to the area.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Jennifer Great Host/Manager!!
data.text: The stay here at the Value Place was great. They staff was amazing and made it really easy to transition into a new place. We stayed a month here and was always treated well and never felt like was any bother to any of the staff. The over-night manager was very friendly and helpful. She was AMAZING! Thanks and will recommend to friends and family.

owner_response.author: Heather L, Guest Relations Manager at WoodSpring Suites Denver Aurora, responded to this review
owner_response.text: We will be sure to let the staff know you were happy with their service. We always want to be accommodating as we can to each of our guests. Thank you for sharing your kind words with us and we hope to see you again soon.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: 😌😌
data.text: The staff at Value place are always on point, our rooms are cleaned to the T and towels and wash cloths available always. Despite the location this hotel is nice, and Da'Ron Da' Ron's the ish he makes our stay well worth the pay! If you decide to come here deal with him and I'll bet you'll write a good review too,! Thanks for everything our stay has been great!😤

owner_response.author: Heather L, Guest Relations Manager at WoodSpring Suites Denver Aurora, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for sharing such kind words about our staff. We will be sure to let them know their efforts did not go unnoticed. We look forward to welcoming you back soon.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Work Stay
data.text:
This is my second summer staying at this location (4 months last year and 5 this year) and once again it was great. 

DaRon the general mgr. runs a very clean and efficient hotel and I never had a problem. I will be back in the spring for work in Denver and I will be staying here once again.

owner_response.author: Heather L, Guest Relations Manager at WoodSpring Suites Denver Aurora, responded to this review
owner_response.text: We are glad to hear you have enjoyed a returned visit to Value Place. Returning guest, like yourself, are the sole purpose of our mission to create the ideal hospitable environment. Thank you for the taking time to let us know how we are doing. We are delighted to have you as customer and can't wait to have you back in the future.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Staff
data.text: I have been staying at Value Place for a while now, and I must say that the staff at this location is amazing, fast, friendly, and very professional. Every need I have they meet right away, Walter, DaRon, Ian, Gina, Mary, and Shatieria are the absolute best staff ever!!! I thank them for everything!

owner_response.author: Heather L, Guest Relations Manager at WoodSpring Suites Denver Aurora, responded to this review
owner_response.text: We cannot thank you enough for your continued support. Your positive thoughts and insight are greatly appreciated and we hope you will continue to stay with Value Place. Customers like you are the reason we strive to uphold such high standards. Thank you again and hope to see you soon.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Very comfortable/Best price available
data.text: Other reviewers are correct---just ask for the GM DaRon. He was attentive, courteous, and professional and helped to make our 3-week stay very enjoyable. Mary in the Housekeeping Dept was also extremely kind and concerned with making our stay comfortable. The studio room we stayed in was compact but had very usable space---especially the kitchen. With such great service and good accommodations, it is extra amazing that this was by far the most affordable extended-stay hotel we could find.

owner_response.author: Heather L, Guest Relations Manager at WoodSpring Suites Denver Aurora, responded to this review
owner_response.text: On behalf of our entire staff here at Value Place we would like to thank you for staying with us and we hope to see you again when your travels bring you back to the area.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Just ask for DeRon or Staff
data.text: I was in a position several months ago where I moved to Denver and my living arrangements did not go according to plan. But I was extremely fortunate to have spoken with the general manager, DeRon Porter, and he was able to book me with a room on relatively short notice. From the very beginning he was professional and that carried over during the several months that I stayed there. The facility was clean, well-lit and well-kept.  I was supposed to write this two months ago when I moved out...things happen...however, regardless of how long it took to do it, I would not let it rest until it got done. I highly recommend this location. And I wish the entire staff the best!

owner_response.author: Heather L, Guest Relations Manager at WoodSpring Suites Denver Aurora, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Hearing back from happy customers is one of the best things we can receive as a company. Thank you for sharing your kind words about our staff. We will be sure to let them know how much they are appreciated. We hope to see you again.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: not happy with the area
data.text: In the heart of drug alley, constant party on 3rd floor til 2,3,or 4 in the morning. Don't use this hotel if you have other options. Next door at the travellodge the cops are there at least 3 times a week.

owner_response.author: Heather L, Guest Relations Manager at WoodSpring Suites Denver Aurora, responded to this review
owner_response.text: The Value Place team deeply apologizes for your negative experience during your stay with us. The issues you have mentioned will be addressed and handled. It is our mission to provide our guest with a positive experience, and in your case, we are deeply sorry that you were not pleased. We wish you the best.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Pay for toilet paper, crap wi-fi, and a party every night
data.text: If you'd like to stay at the world's most ghetto hotel, come to value place. Let's start here, one night, we were out of toilet paper, so we called the front desk. The front desk said they were out and we would have to wait until the next day for toilet paper. The next day came, we attempted again.This time, the toilet paper was a part of the "linen exchange" program that cost $9.87 to be a part of. The linen exchange program is a service that the hotel will wash your sheets and towels weekly, as well as give you new trash bags and toilet paper. So that being said, we found out that it is the guest's responsibility to secure their own toilet paper. I can not believe the type of hotel that doesn't have the extremely cheap toilet paper automatically provided for customers. Explain to me how toilet paper is physically a "linen" though. That's an argument for another time. This ghetto establishment has its own internet publicist ready to respond to any negative reviews. The management couldn't have acted more unprofessional, as well as the staff couldn't appear to be more unprofessional. The area manager, Nate, couldn't have treated me as a paying guest more, more unprofessionally. Just know this place is not worth it, no matter how much you save. Worst hotel experience possible.  I will never return to this hotel and neither should you. One star because you couldn't pick zero.

owner_response.author: Heather L, Guest Relations Manager at WoodSpring Suites Denver Aurora, responded to this review
owner_response.text: We are sorry to hear your stay with Value Place was not a fully positive one. We strive to accommodate our guest as much as we can. The issues you mentioned will be addressed and handled as needed. Thank you for your time and we apologize again for any inconvenience you might have encountered during your stay with us.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Denver Visit in August 2015
data.text: Very friendly staff, clean, convenient and just the basics, but we were touring most of the time and only slept there.  The area was well lit and quiet, no issues with longterm residents.  Should've thought of pans and kitchen necessities, but they were available for purchase if you wanted them.   We would stay again!

owner_response.author: Heather L, Guest Relations Manager at WoodSpring Suites Denver Aurora, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Let me first say how much I appreciate that you took time out of your schedule to share your experience with us! The entire team works vigorously to ensure guests have a great stay. We thrive to deliver a quality level of service and professionalism from booking to check-out. Thank you again and we look forward to serving you next time you come to Aurora!
owner_response.title: Owner Response
